PageTitle: mpls te backup hot-standby (SR Tunnel interface view)
FuncDef:
The mpls te backup hot-standby command enables hot standby for an SR-MPLS TE tunnel.
The undo mpls te backup hot-standby command disables hot standby for an SR-MPLS TE tunnel.
By default, the hot-standby function is disabled on the SR-MPLS TE tunnel.
CLIs: mpls te backup hot-standby { mode { revertive [ wtr <interval> ] | non-revertive } | wtr <interval> }
undo mpls te backup hot-standby mode { revertive [ wtr ] | non-revertive }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the Wait-to-Restore time in hot standby.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 2592000, in seconds. By default, the value is 10.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To improve the reliability of an SR-MPLS TE tunnel, you are advised to configure hot standby for end-to-end protection.
Precautions
Enabling tunnel backup automatically enables the route record function no matter whether the mpls te record-route command is run.
